channel.propagation: RP(d) = received power at distance d XP = transmitted power X(sigma) = lognormal random Gaussian component ========================================================= RP(d)/XP [dB] = -10 x 3.0 x log(d/1.0m) + X(sigma) - 38.0 =========================================================
channel.frame: min preamble (aka syncbits) = 8 physical bits per byte = 12 extra framing bits = 0
